body.name: SVA Organics Rose Water 4oz (118 ml) Refreshing Rose Water Spray for Skin Care, Skin Hydration, Bath, Soaps, Haircare & Aromatherapy

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: Premium Quality Rose Water: SVA Rose Water Organic is prepared by hydro-distillation of Rose Petals from Rosa Damascena. Our Rose Water is free of preservatives and comes with a spray for easy application and use. It is not tested on Animals. We care for you!

How To Use: SVA Organics Rose Water is easy to use. Simply spray on skin and hair throughout the day, as and when desired. You can also use the spray on the bottle for deodorizing the surroundings. For application on the skin, either spray directly or spray some product on a cotton ball and swipe it across the skin.

Skin Nourishment: SVA Organics Rose Water spray is perfect for use as a mist for skincare and body care. It can be sprayed over the face or body for a refreshing feeling. Rose water may help hydrate the skin and provide several benefits upon application.

Aromatherapy: Organic Rose Water has a pleasant floral aroma. Use organic rose water as a deodorizer for an aromatic ambience. You can also spray the rose water inside a room or on fabrics like sofas and curtains for its floral scent.
Multiple Uses: SVA Rose Water is ideal for use as a floral mist as it creates a fragrant ambience, making it useful for addition to bathwater, shower gels, shampoo, and soaps.

Haircare: You can also use SVA Organics Rose Water for application on hair as a mist. It may nourish the hair and add a floral scent to the hair length. You can use it by adding it to your shampoo, conditioner, and hair mask.

Customer Satisfaction: SVA is committed to providing customers with high-quality products that deliver an extraordinary experience. Customer Satisfaction is our prime focus, and we continue to offer the genuine quality we are known for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Facial Spray
reviews.reviewText: As a 25 year old guy this is my first time incorporating SVA Organics Rose Water into my routine and it has been a really nice experience. The 4oz spray provides effective hydration, leaving my skin feeling refreshed. The natural scent, although not my personal favorite (I'd rate it a 3), is subtle and NATURAL smelling not like a parfum or additive which is good for the skin. Its simplicity and effectiveness make it a practical addition to my daily skincare regimen. If you're seeking a straightforward product for everyday use, the SVA Organics Rose Water is worth considering. Something I would like to see in the future is maybe adding Urea or glycerin if possible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this ❤️❤️❤️ It’s part of my skin routine.
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t a skin caring person before but now I’m on my second bottle. I use it in the morning and in the night to spray on my face right after washing/shower and before a serum followed by moisturizer/night cream. I love that it comes with the sprayer. Lovely aroma. It instantly changes my mood. Sometimes I spray it on my hair, on my underarms to smell nicer for staying home when I’m not using deo or perfume. It’s shipped nicely in a little box that has compartments for the bottle and the plastic wrapped spray-head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells So Good
reviews.reviewText: I’ve heard so much about how good rose water is for the skin! This product comes with all natural ingredients too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, purchased several times for soothing itchy skin conditions and feminine discomfort
reviews.reviewText: In doing some research I found that rose water is good for soothing irritated, itchy skin.I have dermographia and my skin gets very irritated easily, to the point where I will scratch and scratch, and it doesn't take much for my skin to feel like it is on fire. I started using this to spray on my skin when I would get like that, and personally, I have found it to be soothing, with a nice cooling feel. I also use this for certain uncomfortable female related issue as well, and it will moisturize and sooth the itching really well, and pretty quickly.I don't let this run out, I keep it on hand at all times, and appreciate that the bottle is on the smaller side and feels portable enough to travel with. It is definitely rose scented, so it is a light, floral, feminine scent, which might not appeal to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have interlocks and I love how the way this product hydrates my hair without weighing it down. I also love the fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My experience with this particular rosewater spray has been rather disappointing, to say the least. At the outset, I was drawn to it because it claimed to be organic, promising a natural and pure product. However, my skepticism grew as I used it over time, and I began to question the validity of its organic label.Firstly, there's a lack of transparency regarding its organic certification. It's concerning that the product doesn't provide clear information about the source of the roses used or the production process. Without these details, it's challenging to trust that it's genuinely organic. I expected more openness and assurance about its authenticity.Furthermore, the scent and consistency of this rosewater spray didn't match my expectations. Authentic rosewater is known for its delightful and refreshing aroma of roses, but this product seemed to lack that characteristic scent. Additionally, the texture and sensation on the skin felt slightly off. I couldn't help but wonder if the ingredients were truly what they claimed to be.In the end, my doubts about this rosewater spray's organic status and the authenticity of its ingredients overshadowed any potential benefits. I believe it's essential for products to deliver on their promises, especially when they market themselves as organic and natural. Given my experience, I would advise others to consider alternative rosewater sprays from more reputable sources that provide greater clarity and assurance about their quality and organic certification.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love using rose water as a toner and this is my go to brand. No added chemicals or alcohol, just 100% rose water. So refreshing and smells great. 10/10 recommend.
